thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Southwark (Tate Modern) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good Location - Review
thread.title_full: Good Location - Review of Premier Inn London Southwark (Tate Modern) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: LisaBB1
title: Good Location - Review
text:
Situated behind the Tate Modern, the Southbank and around the corner from Southwark Underground Station this Premier Inn is in a good location. Plenty of supermarkets, cafes and bars nearby.
The room was a good size, clean and quiet (ask for a room away from the main street for a bit more peace) Water was a little on the tepid side and the pressure was low so ran slowly, by the time I'd filled the bath the water was cold.
The staff were a little flustered when we arrived as the manager had just been taken ill, there didn't seem to be anyone in place to take charge and our welcome was not warm and friendly and we didn't receive the usual relevant info, such as breakfast times etc. On the whole though the staff were accommodating, especially the male members, the females were a little frosty, didn't say good morning when we came down for breakfast or even offer up a smile, the little things that can make a stay in a Hotel more pleasurable.
I stay in Premier Inns regularly and this one is a little tight on providing tea bags, coffee, sugar, milk etc.in the rooms, I had to keep returning to the reception to ask for more.
High praise to security though, a group of lads were playing loud music in the enclosed area in the middle of the Inn on Saturday night and a member of the team was there instantly and moving them on, thank you for that as they'd woken me up!
These are just small niggles though really and I would happily stay at this Premier Inn again.
